name: Pizza
preparation_steps: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce on the dough and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Garnish with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.

name: Salad
preparation_steps: Wash and chop the vegetables.
Combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and carrot in a large bowl.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and toss to coat.

name: Sweet Potato
preparation_steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Wash and slice the sweet potato.
Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway through.

name: Gnocchi
preparation_steps: Boil water in a large pot and add gnocchi. Cook until they float to the surface.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté garlic until golden.
Add cooked gnocchi and toss to coat.
Top with parmesan and parsley before serving.

name: Pot Roast
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 325°F (163°C).
Season roast with salt and pepper and sear in a hot skillet.
Place roast in a baking dish with carrots, potatoes, onion, and beef broth.
Cover and cook for 3-4 hours until tender.

name: Lasagna
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Brown the ground beef in a skillet and drain excess fat.
Layer noodles, ricotta, ground beef, marinara sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Bake for 45 minutes or until bubbly.

name: Hamburger
preparation_steps: Shape ground beef into a patty and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry patty until cooked to desired doneness.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, and ketchup on a hamburger bun.

name: Pad Thai
preparation_steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté tofu until golden, then add noodles, bean sprouts, and Pad Thai sauce.
Top with crushed peanuts before serving.

name: Almonds
preparation_steps: Enjoy almonds as a quick snack or add to salads and desserts.

name: Sarma
preparation_steps: Blanch cabbage leaves to soften.
Mix ground beef, rice, and onion, and place in cabbage leaves.
Roll and secure each leaf, then cook in a pot with tomato paste and water.

name: Bacon
preparation_steps: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.

name: Hot Dog
preparation_steps: Heat the sausage and place it in the bun.
Top with ketchup and mustard as desired.

name: Chocolate Cake
preparation_steps: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, and melted butter.
Pour into a baking pan and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30-35 minutes.

name: Wheat Bread
preparation_steps: Combine flour, water, yeast, and salt to form dough.
Knead, let rise, then bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.

name: Orange
preparation_steps: Peel and enjoy the orange segments as a fresh snack.

name: Banana
preparation_steps: Peel and enjoy as a fresh snack or add to smoothies.

name: Yogurt
preparation_steps: Enjoy yogurt on its own or with fresh fruit.
